text.autoconfig.npe.option.disable_telem: Disable sending telemetry data to Mojang

npe.warning.server_signing: Uh, oh. It looks like this server does not accept unsigned messages. To join this server, simply enable message signing in the settings. Don't forget to disable it again later though!
